title: AI in Education Workshop
description: This interactive workshop explores how artificial intelligence is transforming the educational landscape. Participants will engage in hands-on demonstrations of adaptive learning systems, AI tutors, and ethical debates around the role of automation in modern classrooms.

title: Community Coding Bootcamp
description: A week-long crash course in full-stack web development for beginners and aspiring developers. Topics include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and basic database integration. Daily sessions are instructor-led with live coding exercises and project building.

title: Entrepreneurship Panel Discussion
description: Join a panel of successful entrepreneurs, alumni, and startup investors as they share their journeys, challenges, and strategies for launching and scaling businesses. A Q&A session and informal networking opportunity will follow the discussion.

title: Exam Stress Management Seminar
description: Designed for students preparing for final exams, this seminar offers practical tips on managing stress and maintaining mental well-being. Topics include breathing techniques, productivity routines, and guided mindfulness exercises with a certified mental health coach.

title: Open Day 2025
description: Future students and their families are invited to explore our campus and learn more about our academic programs. The Open Day includes guided tours, department meet-and-greets, sample lectures, and an information session on student life and admissions.
